Text: Re survey Cc up questions or additions a If you feel you were evaluated unfairly do you feel comfortable voicing your concern If there is a significant age difference between you and your manager was the issue ever openly discussed Reply Separator Subject survey Author jonathan arraCOM at InternetUSA Date PM Getting close to a real draft please review and send comments Your manager is much younger younger same older much older If managed diddo you feel fairly evaluated in your perfromanceabitlities Positvely Negatively Did you make any active attempt to alter the performance evaluation system Reword Do you feel that your perfromance was influenced by the age difference between you and your supervisor A lot somewhat not at all positively negatively Would you say that you are willing to shift your job schedule work through lunch or nont the weekend in order to help solve a problem All the time sometimes rarely Leavingturnover If you were to or did leave your job how much would you attribute to the age difference between you and your supervisor much little To what extent would you say your manager encourages your career growth through educational and new work opportunities Little Much
